Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

I am fairly new to KSP, I have managed to break the atmosphere though am struggling with getting into orbit, I have done the tutorials and working my way through the career mode. Any help, hints and tips would be very much appreciated.
I am fairly old to KSP. I have managed to do a bunch off stuff, but still suck at SSTO planes. Oodles of tips can be found here. Your presence is much appreciated.

Hello Mikey86 and welcome to the forum!

Check out the tutorials section that Vanamonde linked.  Also be sure to peruse the KSP Wiki. 

Happy landings!
